verses.text:
And \w Hannah|strong="H2584"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w rejoiceth|strong="H5970"\w* in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, mine \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* is \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* is \w enlarged|strong="H7337"\w* over mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*; because I \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in thy \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.

\add There is\add* none \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for \add there is\add* none \w beside|strong="H1115"\w* thee: neither \add is there\add* any \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* like our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Talk|strong="H1696"\w* no \w more|strong="H7235"\w* so \w exceeding|strong="H1364"\w* \w proudly|strong="H1364"\w*; let \add not\add* \w arrogancy|strong="H6277"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* out of your \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* a \w God|strong="H0410"\w* of \w knowledge|strong="H1844"\w*, and by him \w actions|strong="H5949"\w* are \w weighed|strong="H8505"\w*.\f + \fr 2.3 \ft arrogancy: Heb. hard\f*

The \w bows|strong="H7198"\w* of the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \add are\add* \w broken|strong="H2844"\w*, and they that \w stumbled|strong="H3782"\w* are \w girded|strong="H0247"\w* with \w strength|strong="H2428"\w*.

\add They that were\add* \w full|strong="H7649"\w* have hired \w out|strong="H7936"\w* themselves for \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*; and \add they that were\add* \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w* \w ceased|strong="H2308"\w*: so that the \w barren|strong="H6135"\w* hath \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w*; and she that hath \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* is waxed \w feeble|strong="H0535"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w killeth|strong="H4191"\w*, and maketh \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*: he bringeth \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w*, and bringeth \w up|strong="H5927"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* maketh \w poor|strong="H3423"\w*, and maketh \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*: he bringeth \w low|strong="H8213"\w*, \w and|strong="H0637"\w* lifteth \w up|strong="H7311"\w*.

He raiseth \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* out of the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, \add and\add* lifteth \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w beggar|strong="H0034"\w* from the \w dunghill|strong="H0830"\w*, to \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \add them\add* among \w princes|strong="H5081"\w*, and to make them \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*: for the \w pillars|strong="H4690"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add are\add* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and he hath \w set|strong="H7896"\w* the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* upon them.

He will \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* of his \w saints|strong="H2623"\w*, and the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall be \w silent|strong="H1826"\w* in \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*; for by \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* shall no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w prevail|strong="H1396"\w*.

The \w adversaries|strong="H7378"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall be broken to \w pieces|strong="H2865"\w*; out of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* shall he \w thunder|strong="H7481"\w* upon them: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* the \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; and he shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* unto his \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* the \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* of his \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*.

And \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. And the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w did|strong="H1961"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

¶ Now the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \add were\add* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w*; they \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the \w priests’|strong="H3548"\w* \w custom|strong="H4941"\w* with the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add was, that\add*, when any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w offered|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, while the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* was in \w seething|strong="H1310"\w*, with a \w fleshhook|strong="H4207"\w* of \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*;

And he \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \add it\add* into the \w pan|strong="H3595"\w*, or \w kettle|strong="H1731"\w*, or \w caldron|strong="H7037"\w*, or \w pot|strong="H6517"\w*; all that the \w fleshhook|strong="H4207"\w* brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* for himself. So they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* in \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* unto all the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* thither.

Also before they \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w*, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* to \w roast|strong="H6740"\w* for the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*; for he will not \w have|strong="H3947"\w* \w sodden|strong="H1310"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of thee, but \w raw|strong="H2416"\w*.

And \add if\add* any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Let them not \w fail|strong="H6999"\w* to \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w presently|strong="H3117"\w*, and \add then\add* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add as much\add* as thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w desireth|strong="H0183"\w*; then he would \w answer|strong="H0559"\w* him, \add Nay;\add* but thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add it me\add* now: and if not, I will \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add it\add* by \w force|strong="H2394"\w*.\f + \fr 2.16 \ft presently: Heb. as on the day\f*

Wherefore the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* of the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* was \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: for \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w abhorred|strong="H5006"\w* the \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ But \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add being\add* a \w child|strong="H5288"\w*, \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* with a \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*.

Moreover his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* him a \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w coat|strong="H4598"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \add it\add* to him from \w year|strong="H3117"\w* to \w year|strong="H3117"\w*, when she came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* to \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* the \w yearly|strong="H3117"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*.

¶ And \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w* and his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* thee \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of this \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* for the \w loan|strong="H7596"\w* which is \w lent|strong="H7592"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. And they \w went|strong="H1980"\w* unto their own \w home|strong="H4725"\w*.  +  r 2.20  t loan…: or, petition which she asked, etc *

\w And|strong="H3588"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w visited|strong="H6485"\w* \w Hannah|strong="H2584"\w*, so that she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, and \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. And the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w grew|strong="H1431"\w* \w before|strong="H5973"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ Now \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* was \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w*, and \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* all that his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and how they \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* with the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* that \w assembled|strong="H6633"\w* \add at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.\f + \fr 2.22 \ft assembled: Heb. assembled by troops\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Why \w do|strong="H6213"\w* ye such \w things|strong="H1697"\w*? for I \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* of your \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w dealings|strong="H1697"\w* by all this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 2.23 \ft of your…: or, evil words of you\f*

Nay, my \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; for \add it is\add* no \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w report|strong="H8052"\w* that I \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*: ye make the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w transgress|strong="H5674"\w*.\f + \fr 2.24 \ft transgress: or, cry out\f*

If one \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* against \w another|strong="H0376"\w*, the \w judge|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w judge|strong="H6419"\w* him: but if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, who shall \w intreat|strong="H6419"\w* for him? Notwithstanding they \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, because the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w would|strong="H2654"\w* \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* them.

And the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w grew|strong="H1432"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w*, and was in \w favour|strong="H2896"\w* both with the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and also with \w men|strong="H0582"\w*.

¶ And there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* unto \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Did I \w plainly|strong="H1540"\w* \w appear|strong="H1540"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, when they were in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* in \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*?

And did I \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* him out of all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add to be\add* my \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, to \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* upon mine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, to \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*, to \w wear|strong="H5375"\w* an \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me? and did I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* all the offerings made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

Wherefore \w kick|strong="H1163"\w* ye at my \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* and at mine \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, which I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \add in my\add* \w habitation|strong="H4583"\w*; and \w honourest|strong="H3513"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* above me, to make yourselves \w fat|strong="H1254"\w* with the \w chiefest|strong="H7225"\w* of all the \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*?

Wherefore the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saith|strong="H5002"\w*, I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w indeed|strong="H0559"\w* \add that\add* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, should \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: but now the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w saith|strong="H5002"\w*, Be it far from \w me|strong="H2486"\w*; for them that \w honour|strong="H3513"\w* me I will \w honour|strong="H3513"\w*, and they that \w despise|strong="H0959"\w* me shall be lightly \w esteemed|strong="H7043"\w*.

Behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, that I will cut \w off|strong="H1438"\w* thine \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, and the \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* of thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that there shall not be an old \w man|strong="H2205"\w* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And thou shalt \w see|strong="H5027"\w* an \w enemy|strong="H6862"\w* \add in my\add* \w habitation|strong="H4583"\w*, in all \add the wealth\add* which \add God\add* shall \w give|strong="H3190"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and there shall not be an old \w man|strong="H2205"\w* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 2.32 \ft an enemy…: or, the affliction of the tabernacle, for all the wealth which God would have given Israel\f*

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of thine, \add whom\add* I shall not cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from mine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \add shall be\add* to \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and to \w grieve|strong="H0109"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*: and all the \w increase|strong="H4768"\w* of thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in the flower of their \w age|strong="H0582"\w*.\f + \fr 2.33 \ft in the flower…: Heb. men\f*

And this \add shall be\add* a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* unto thee, that shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon thy \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, on \w Hophni|strong="H2652"\w* and \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*; in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* they shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them.

And I will raise me \w up|strong="H6965"\w* a \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \add that\add* shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to \add that\add* which \add is\add* in mine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* and in my \w mind|strong="H5315"\w*: and I will \w build|strong="H1129"\w* him a \w sure|strong="H0539"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and he shall \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* mine \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* for \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* every one that is \w left|strong="H3498"\w* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \add and\add* \w crouch|strong="H7812"\w* to him for a \w piece|strong="H0095"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and a \w morsel|strong="H3603"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Put|strong="H5596"\w* me, I pray thee, into \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w priests’ offices|strong="H3550"\w*, that I may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* a \w piece|strong="H6595"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.\f + \fr 2.36 \ft Put: Heb. Join\f*\f + \fr 2.36 \ft one of…: or, somewhat about the priesthood\f*
